content: In terms of guidance, given Aspen University's decision to voluntarily suspend enrollments and the formation of new cohorts at its two Phoenix pre-licensure campuses, effective February 2022, we've revised our outlook for fiscal year 2022 revenue to a new range of $75.5 million to $77.5 million from the prior range of $77 million to $80 million that we provided in the second quarter fiscal 2022 earnings release on December 14, 2021. Due to Aspen University's decision to voluntarily suspend enrollments and the formation of new cohorts at its two Phoenix pre-licensure campuses effective February 2022, we have revised our outlook for fiscal year 2022 revenue to a range of $75.5 million to $77.5 million from the prior range of $77 million to $80 million.
